name: HL P84
description: Cow-split leather glove with lined palm, fabric back and canvas cuff. Excellent tear & abrasion resistance.
short_description: Cow-split leather glove with lined palm, fabric back and canvas cuff

short_description_locales.it: Guanto in pelle crosta di bovino con palmo foderato, dorso in tela e manichetta in canvas

Operazioni generiche di media gravità e rischi meccanici

name: HL 8801-DSR
description: Knitted cut‑protection glove in nylon, HPPE, tungsten & spandex, with sandy‑nitrile palm coating, reinforced between thumb & index. Protects critical cut zones while maintaining comfort & dexterity.
short_description: 13‑gauge cut‑protection glove with sandy‑nitrile palm and thumb–index reinforcement.
features: Excellent grip in slightly oily conditions
applications: Handling small sharp components in mechanical, glass & steel industries

description_locales.en: Knitted cut‑protection glove in nylon, HPPE, tungsten & spandex, with sandy‑nitrile palm coating, reinforced between thumb & index. Protects critical cut zones while maintaining comfort & dexterity.
description_locales.it: Guanto antitaglio in nylon, HPPE, tungsteno e spandex con spalmatura in nitrile sabbiato, rinforzato tra pollice e indice. Protegge aree critiche da taglio mantenendo comfort e destrezza.

short_description_locales.en: 13‑gauge cut‑protection glove with sandy‑nitrile palm and thumb–index reinforcement.
short_description_locales.it: Guanto antitaglio 13 aghi con palmo sabbiato in nitrile e rinforzo tra pollice‑indice.

en: Excellent grip in slightly oily conditions
it: Ottima presa in ambiente leggermente oleoso

en: Handling small sharp components in mechanical, glass & steel industries
it: Manipolazione piccoli componenti taglienti in industria meccanica, vetro, acciaio

name: HL 3808-D
description: Cut-resistant glove with PU-coated palm, 18-gauge construction using tungsten, HPPE, nylon & spandex. Provides superior dexterity and maximum cut & abrasion protection in dry and slightly oily environments.
short_description: 18-gauge HPPE/tungsten cut glove with PU palm; superior dexterity and dry/light‑oil grip.
features: Breathable back to ensure comfort during prolonged use
applications: High-precision mechanical work; maximum tactile sensitivity

description_locales.en: Cut-resistant glove with PU-coated palm, 18-gauge construction using tungsten, HPPE, nylon & spandex. Provides superior dexterity and maximum cut & abrasion protection in dry and slightly oily environments.
description_locales.it:
Guanto antitaglio con palmo spalmato in poliuretano, 18 aghi costruito con filati di tungsteno, HPPE, nylon e spandex.
Fornisce destrezza superiore e massima protezione da taglio e abrasione anche in ambienti lievemente oleosi.

short_description_locales.en: 18-gauge HPPE/tungsten cut glove with PU palm; superior dexterity and dry/light‑oil grip.
short_description_locales.it: Guanto antitaglio 18 aghi con palmo spalmato PU; destrezza superiore e presa in asciutto/olio leggero.

en: Breathable back to ensure comfort during prolonged use
it: Dorso traspirante per comfort in uso prolungato

en: High-precision mechanical work; maximum tactile sensitivity
it: Manipolazione componenti ad alto rischio taglio
Lavorazioni meccaniche di alta precisione; massima sensibilità tattile

name: 49KCUT5
description:
Welder's glove in cowhide leather with full lining and HPPE/steel cut‑resistant internal mesh for Level C cut protection. 
Provides advanced contact‑heat resistance, abrasion, tear and cut protection while maintaining comfort.
short_description: Lined cowhide‑leather welder’s glove with internal HPPE+steel cut‑resistant mesh. High cut and contact‑heat protection.

description_locales.en:
Welder's glove in cowhide leather with full lining and HPPE/steel cut‑resistant internal mesh for Level C cut protection. 
Provides advanced contact‑heat resistance, abrasion, tear and cut protection while maintaining comfort.
description_locales.it:
Guanto per saldatore in pelle crosta bovina foderato con maglia interna antitaglio in HPPE+acciaio. 
Elevata protezione al taglio e calore da contatto.

short_description_locales.en: Lined cowhide‑leather welder’s glove with internal HPPE+steel cut‑resistant mesh. High cut and contact‑heat protection.
short_description_locales.it: Guanto per saldatore in pelle crosta bovina foderato con maglia interna antitaglio in HPPE+acciaio. Elevata protezione al taglio e calore da contatto.

it: Guanto disegnato per operazioni di saldatura di metalli pesanti

description: Thermal glove in 8 oz cotton with double-knit palm and knitted cuff for operations up to 250°C.
short_description: 8 oz cotton heat-resistant glove up to 250 °C
features: Lightweight and practical for tasks requiring good precision
Knitted cuff to protect against potential sharp or hot objects
Certified for contact temperature up to 250°C
applications: Handling glass-industry objects outside the hot zone

description_locales.en: Thermal glove in 8 oz cotton with double-knit palm and knitted cuff for operations up to 250°C.
description_locales.it: Guanto in cotone 8 oz con palmo doppio garzato e polso maglia per operazioni fino a 250 °C.

short_description_locales.en: 8 oz cotton heat-resistant glove up to 250 °C
short_description_locales.it: Guanto in cotone 8oz anticalore fino a 250C

en: Lightweight and practical for tasks requiring good precision
Knitted cuff to protect against potential sharp or hot objects
Certified for contact temperature up to 250°C
it: Leggero e pratico per operazioni che richiedono buona precisione
Polso maglia per proteggere da potenziali corpi taglienti o caldi

en: Handling glass-industry objects outside the hot zone
it: Manipolazione oggetti nell'idustria del vetro fuori dalla zona calda

name: HL CSW 100x100x560
description: Heat-resistant cotton swabbing tools with optional protective felt head cover, featuring a strong yet malleable metal handle for safe and precise mould maintenance in glass manufacturing, metal casting, forging, and ceramic forming.
short_description: Cotton swab with optional head cover and metal handle
features: Heat-resistant cotton pads with optional head cover
Strong but malleable handles designed for safe operation and precise application in hot-end environments. Available with and without ring.
Multiple head shapes and sizes (incl. custom size)
Durable construction. Resistant to high heat, abrasion, and repeated industrial use.
applications: Lubricating blank, neck, and blow moulds in bottle and jar production
Mould lubrication in non-ferrous metal casting

description_locales.en: Heat-resistant cotton swabbing tools with optional protective felt head cover, featuring a strong yet malleable metal handle for safe and precise mould maintenance in glass manufacturing, metal casting, forging, and ceramic forming.
description_locales.it: Scovoli in cotone resistenti al calore con copritesta protettivo in feltro opzionale, dotati di manico in metallo robusto ma flessibile per una manutenzione sicura e precisa degli stampi nella produzione del vetro, colata dei metalli, forgiatura e formatura della ceramica.

short_description_locales.en: Cotton swab with optional head cover and metal handle
short_description_locales.it: Scovolo in cotone con feltro opzionale in punta e manico in metallo

en: Heat-resistant cotton pads with optional head cover
Strong but malleable handles designed for safe operation and precise application in hot-end environments. Available with and without ring.
Multiple head shapes and sizes (incl. custom size)
Durable construction. Resistant to high heat, abrasion, and repeated industrial use.
it: Scovoli in cotone resistenti al calore con feltro protettivo opzionale
Manici robusti ma flessibili, progettati per un utilizzo sicuro e un’applicazione precisa nella zona calda. Disponibile con e senza anello.
Varie forme e dimensioni (incluse misure personalizzate)
Struttura durevole, resistente alle alte temperature, all’abrasione e all’uso industriale ripetuto

name: 152/12 015L
description: Heat-resistant glove in 12 oz cotton, five-finger design with a double-knit inner palm and a 13 cm cuff. Protects up to 250°C, with excellent tear resistance and superior comfort for prolonged use.
short_description: Heat-resistant glove (250 °C) in cotton with high comfort for extended use
features: Reinforced leather seams between palm & thumb
applications: Handling hot glass & ceramics up to 250°C

description_locales.en: Heat-resistant glove in 12 oz cotton, five-finger design with a double-knit inner palm and a 13 cm cuff. Protects up to 250°C, with excellent tear resistance and superior comfort for prolonged use.

short_description_locales.en: Heat-resistant glove (250 °C) in cotton with high comfort for extended use

name: HL 099
description: Driver glove in full‑grain bovine leather, lined, with an 8 cm cuff. Offers high abrasion, tear and puncture resistance for medium‑duty general‑purpose tasks.
short_description: Full‑grain bovine leather Driver glove, lined, with 8 cm split‑leather cuff.

description_locales.en: Driver glove in full‑grain bovine leather, lined, with an 8 cm cuff. Offers high abrasion, tear and puncture resistance for medium‑duty general‑purpose tasks.
description_locales.it: Guanto Driver in pelle fiore di bovino, foderato e con manichetta da 8 cm. Offre elevata resistenza ad abrasione, strappo e perforazione per impieghi generici di media gravosità.

short_description_locales.en: Full‑grain bovine leather Driver glove, lined, with 8 cm split‑leather cuff.
short_description_locales.it: Guanto in pelle fiore di bovino con palmo foderato e manichetta in crosta da 8 cm.

name: HL 1000
description: Three‑finger heat‑resistant glove of multilayer silica‑ceramic fabric with double felts, Nomex and silica pads. Aluminum‑reflective. CE Category III PPE with high protection against cut & puncture plus thermal protection up to 1,000 °C.
short_description: Three‑finger heat‑resistant glove in multilayer silica‑ceramic fabric. Protection up to 1000 °C.
features: CE Category III personal protection equipment
Certified for extremely high temperatures (> 500°C), protects up to 1000°C
Protection against molten‑metal splashes for hand and forearm

description_locales.en: Three‑finger heat‑resistant glove of multilayer silica‑ceramic fabric with double felts, Nomex and silica pads. Aluminum‑reflective. CE Category III PPE with high protection against cut & puncture plus thermal protection up to 1,000 °C.
description_locales.it: Guanto anticalore a tre dita in tessuto di fibra di silice e ceramica multistrato con doppio feltro, Nomex e materassino silice. Riflettente alluminizzato. Dispositivo di Categoria CE III con elevata resistenza al taglio e alla perforazione e protezione fino a 1,000°C.

short_description_locales.en: Three‑finger heat‑resistant glove in multilayer silica‑ceramic fabric. Protection up to 1000 °C.
short_description_locales.it: Guanto anticalore a tre dita in tessuto silice e ceramica, multistrato. Protezione fino a 1,000C.

en: CE Category III personal protection equipment
Certified for extremely high temperatures (> 500°C), protects up to 1000°C
Protection against molten‑metal splashes for hand and forearm
it: Dispositivo di protezione individuale di Categoria III
Certificato per temperature elevatissime (> 500°C), offre protezione fino a 1,000°C
Protezione spruzzi metallo fuso per mano e avanbraccio
Applicazioni in ambienti a temperature estreme (es: fonderie)

name: HL 6WWG
description: Premium full‑grain bovine leather Driver glove. Offers maximum abrasion, tear and puncture resistance while maintaining excellent comfort and fit. Handles hot parts up to ~100 °C.
short_description: Full‑grain bovine‑leather Driver glove; heat‑resistant with high dexterity.

description_locales.en: Premium full‑grain bovine leather Driver glove. Offers maximum abrasion, tear and puncture resistance while maintaining excellent comfort and fit. Handles hot parts up to ~100 °C.
description_locales.it: Guanto driver in pelle fiore di bovino di prima qualità. Offre massima resistenza ad abrasione, strappo e perforazione mantenendo comfort e vestibilità eccellenti.

short_description_locales.en: Full‑grain bovine‑leather Driver glove; heat‑resistant with high dexterity.
short_description_locales.it: Guanto in pelle fiore di bovino driver, con resistenza EN407.

it: Attività edilizie e costruzioni, magazzinaggio, agricoltura per lavori di media protezione.

name: HL 8808-S
description: 18‑gauge cotton glove with sandy‑nitrile coated palm; hypoallergenic. Delivers high dexterity, optimal grip and breathability for extended use in humid or lightly oily environments.
short_description: 18‑gauge cotton glove with sandy‑nitrile coated palm; hypoallergenic.
applications: Extended use in humid & lightly oily environments

description_locales.en: 18‑gauge cotton glove with sandy‑nitrile coated palm; hypoallergenic. Delivers high dexterity, optimal grip and breathability for extended use in humid or lightly oily environments.
description_locales.it: Guanto in cotone 18 aghi con palmo spalmato in sandy nitrile, anallergico, con elevata destrezza, presa ottimale e traspirabilità per uso prolungato in ambienti umidi o leggermente oleosi.

short_description_locales.en: 18‑gauge cotton glove with sandy‑nitrile coated palm; hypoallergenic.

name: HL 8808-DS
description: Knitted cut‑protection glove in nylon, HPPE & tungsten filament, 18‑gauge, with sandy‑nitrile palm, ANSI Cut 4. Offers excellent abrasion, cut & tear resistance, with superior grip in oils & lubricants. High blade‑cut protection.
short_description: 18‑gauge cut‑protection glove with sandy‑nitrile palm (ANSI Cut 4).
applications: Handling small sharp components in mechanical, glass & steel industries

description_locales.en: Knitted cut‑protection glove in nylon, HPPE & tungsten filament, 18‑gauge, with sandy‑nitrile palm, ANSI Cut 4. Offers excellent abrasion, cut & tear resistance, with superior grip in oils & lubricants. High blade‑cut protection.
description_locales.it: Guanto antitaglio in nylon, HPPE e filo di tungsteno a 18 aghi, palmo sabbiato in nitrile, ANSI Cut 4. Offre eccellente resistenza all’abrasione, al taglio e allo strappo, con ottima presa in presenza di oli e lubrificanti. Alta protezione al taglio da lama.

short_description_locales.en: 18‑gauge cut‑protection glove with sandy‑nitrile palm (ANSI Cut 4).
short_description_locales.it: Guanto antitaglio (ANSI Cut 4) 18 aghi con palmo sabbiato in nitrile.

it: Manipolazione piccoli componenti taglienti industria meccanica, vetro, acciaio

description: Cut-protection glove with double micro‑foam nitrile palm coating, 13‑gauge. Composition: fiberglass, HPPE, nylon, spandex with NBR finish. Ideal for grip in oily conditions, abrasion resistance and mechanical protection.

description: Heat-resistant glove protecting up to 350°C. Palm protected by triple-layer and back by double-layer 14 oz cotton knit (brushed inside/outside) plus full knuckle guard. 15 cm Kanvas cuff. Guards against molten-material hazards and provides Level 3 cut resistance.
short_description: Heat-resistant glove in cotton (350 °C) with triple layer and back-of-hand reinforcement for high-temperature operations and mechanical hazards
features: Triple layer on palm & double layer on back for full-hand protection
Reinforced leather seams between palm & thumb
applications: Designed for glass industry: handling hot objects up to 350 °C & hot-zone operations
Handling heated components in ceramic production lines

description_locales.en: Heat-resistant glove protecting up to 350°C. Palm protected by triple-layer and back by double-layer 14 oz cotton knit (brushed inside/outside) plus full knuckle guard. 15 cm Kanvas cuff. Guards against molten-material hazards and provides Level 3 cut resistance.
description_locales.it:
Guanto anticalore con protezione fino a 350 °C. Protezione del palmo con triplo strato e del dorso con doppio strato in cotone 14 oz garzato interno/esterno e paranocche intero.
Manichetta in Kanvas da 15 cm.
Copertura da rischi da materiale fuso e protezione al taglio di livello 3.

short_description_locales.en: Heat-resistant glove in cotton (350 °C) with triple layer and back-of-hand reinforcement for high-temperature operations and mechanical hazards
short_description_locales.it: Guanto anticalore in cotone (350C) con triplo strato e protezione del dorso per operazioni ad elevate temperature e con rischi meccanici

en: Triple layer on palm & double layer on back for full-hand protection
Reinforced leather seams between palm & thumb
it: Elevata resistenza al calore da contatto fino a 350 °C
Triplo strato sul palmo e doppio strato sul dorso per protezione completa della mano
Salva cuciture in pelle tra palmo e pollice

en: Designed for glass industry: handling hot objects up to 350 °C & hot-zone operations
Handling heated components in ceramic production lines
it: Studiato per l’industria del vetro per manipolazione di oggetti caldi fino a 350C e operazioni in zona calda
Operazioni di stampa e termoformatura di plastiche calde
Movimentazione di componenti riscaldati in linee di produzione ceramica
